item.title: Halloween Event ! [For PI]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

For starters, you added

case 27254: if(c.grimPrize < 2) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2868, 3546, 0, "modern"); } else { c.sendMessage("You have already completed the halloween event!"); } break; case 13405: if(c.grimPrize == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(107, 6390); } else if (c.grimPrize == 0) { c.sendMessage("Grim stares at you from across the room."); } else if (c.grimPrize == 3) { c.sendMessage("You have already completed the halloween event!"); } break;
In another case statement. You can’t do that

You added this

} else if (token.equals("grimPrize")) { p.grimPrize = Integer.parseInt(token2); }
In the wrong place, you need to add that with the rest of the tokens

And your other errors are quite obvious as well, might I suggest using eclipse IDE.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:14, topic:444481”][quote author=DingDongDing link=topic=547171.msg4011410#msg4011410 date=1339262528]
Add this under that

case 90: sendNpcChat1("Hello mortal.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 91; break; case 91: sendPlayerChat1("Alright mate."); c.nextChat = 92; break; case 92: sendNpcChat1("Fine thanks, and you?", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 93; break; case 93: sendOption3("Pretty good yeah.", "Why are you here?", "I want halloween gear!"); c.dialogueAction = 666; break; case 94: sendNpcChat1("Cool.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 95: sendNpcChat1("I need something dead.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 96; break; case 96: sendPlayerChat1("But your the Grim Reaper..."); c.nextChat = 97; break; case 97: sendNpcChat1("Do you want some gear or not?", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 98; break; case 98: sendPlayerChat1("Fine, what do you want me to kill."); c.nextChat = 99; break; case 99: sendNpcChat1("See that portal over there?", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 100; break; case 100: sendNpcChat1("Go in it, kill whatevers inside then talk to me again.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 0; c.grimPrize = 1; break; case 101: sendNpcChat1("Well done. You killed it.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 102; break; case 102: sendPlayerChat1("Thanks, wheres my free stuff."); c.nextChat = 104; break; case 104: if(c.grimPrize == 2) { int giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } giveGear = Misc.random(6); if(giveGear == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(10723,1); } else if (giveGear == 1) { c.getItems().addItem(10724,1); } else if (giveGear == 2) { c.getItems().addItem(10725,1); } else if (giveGear == 3) { c.getItems().addItem(10726,1); } else if (giveGear == 4) { c.getItems().addItem(10727,1); } else if (giveGear == 5) { c.getItems().addItem(10728,1); } else if (giveGear == 6) { c.getItems().addItem(10735,1); } } else { c.sendMessage("Grim is unimpressed with your attempt to gain extra gear."); c.getPA().startTeleport(3222, 3219, 0, "modern"); return; } sendNpcChat1("In your pack. 7 Random pieces of gear.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 105; c.grimPrize = 3; break; case 105: sendNpcChat1("Try trading with other players if you want a full set.", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 106; break; case 106: c.getPA().startTeleport(3222, 3219, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Grim teleports you back to home"); break; case 107: sendNpcChat1("By the way, its dangerous in there. Still want to go?", c.talkingNpc, "Grim Reaper"); c.nextChat = 108; break; case 108: sendOption2("Yes.", "No."); c.dialogueAction = 667; break;
[/quote]

Sorry, I’m not usually an asshole and I don’t mean to be brash or denounce your topic, but why the fuck do you have an if/else statement the size of the republic of China. Besides the republic sized if/else statement the code looks like an 8 year old who just stopped using a QWERTY keyboard wrote it. This is a good read on code/conventions and readability and if you use eclipse IDE (integrated development environment) there is an automatic indentation feature that can be used to clean your code up.

Anyways, an alternative to avoid massive if/else blocks like you have is to use a switch statement (not for optimization reasons as it would be very minimal) for readability.

switch (condition) {
  case 1:  
  //do stuff 
  break;
  
  case 2:   
  break;
  
  default:  
  break;
}

You could also use polymorphism.[/quote]

I personally prefer if blocks. It’s all stylistic.

Read full topic

Anyways, an alternative to avoid massive if/else blocks like you have is to use a switch statement (not for optimization reasons as it would be very minimal) for readability.

switch (condition) {
  case 1:  
  //do stuff 
  break;
  
  case 2:   
  break;
  
  default:  
  break;
}

You could also use polymorphism for smaller if/else statements.[/quote]

LOLLLLLL

}

You could also use polymorphism.
